mean_cn: v. 撤回，取消，废除；  n. 有牌不跟
mean_en: to officially cancel the power or effect of (something, such as a law, license, agreement, etc.) :to make (something) not valid
word_etyma: re回，向后+vok呼喊+e→收回说出的话→取消，撤回
sentence: The agreement has been revoked and no longer applies.
sentence_trans: 此协议被撤回，不再生效。
